resources.string: Hername is Eaintchuemon.Age is 18 year old.She is so beautiful.She is so brave and incisive. She never tell about abusive word.She love me so much.She have always beside me whatever I happen.

About me\nI am KyawZinLatt.I am 19 year old.I am attending East Yangon University.I have a lover.My lover name is Eaintchuemon.My hobbies are reading book,playing game,watching movie,learning and speaking English language. I am very interesting in Software Development.I want to be Android Developer so I am always learning.
